relation: There are only a handful of clubs on campus, but the clubs that are running are amazing! The advisers spend lots of time planning field trips and organizing events.
Going to UW-Waukesha is way cheaper than going to a four year school! In addition you are able to get much more individual attention from professors!
There is only one place to eat on campus and it closes about 2:30, but there are plenty of vending machines and plenty of place to eat outside of campus in the surrounding city.
You get to live at home, where you are comfortable and can keep your job!
For a person who has taken AP and Honors course, the classes are about the same, but there are plenty of honors options here as well!

Students should not be afraid to come to any of the 2 year colleges because it is a nice steeping stone in between high school and college. Find a quite spot to study. There are plenty of them around!

The University of Wisconsin-Waukesha is an amazing school! The faculty are friendly and caring and the students are very welcoming! Do not be afraid to attend just because it is not a four year campus.
pageTitle: University of Wisconsin Colleges Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textBeforeTable: 03/16/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 1 of 61 Elizabeth from Madison, WI Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Great for these types of students UW-Waukesha is great campus for anyone! Students who don't know what major they want to go into yet, students who do know but want to save some money, students who really don't know if college is quite for them. I really love this campus and I truly know that it has helped me grow as a person. Tips for prospective students I would tell new students to really open up and try getting involved in activities. The more activities you become involved in the more people you meet and more opportunities will arise, such as an officer position or a job on campus. Even if you only get involved in one club, have fun with it. UW-Waukesha has a very supportive student body and faculty staff that will do nothing but encourage you to have the time of your life. Bang for the buck At UW-Waukesha there are many scholarship opportunities if you have trouble affording the already reasonably low priced tuition. The only gripe I might have is the high text book costs, but no matter what college you go to the texts books will be expensive. Am enjoying being here I love the friendly enviornment UW-Waukesha has to offer. All
